news.title: Manhunt for suspect who set woman alight as she is treated for burns to more than 60pc of her body
news.summary: A woman who had petrol thrown in her face before being set on fire at her Dublin home has suffered serious burns to more than half of her body.

news.title: Bank of Ireland’s new ‘Trading Down’ loan will encourage older people to move to smaller homes
news.summary: Bank of Ireland (BoI) will pilot a new loan product allowing people to trade down to a smaller home.

news.title: ‘The toughest part was saying it to my wife’ – Garry Ringrose on his tough Lions call which he does not regret at all
news.summary: Despite the impact on him, Garry Ringrose was more concerned about his wife, Ellen, and their one-year-old son, Freddie, who had made the long journey from Ireland to Australia, than the ramifications of ruling himself out of starting in the second Lions Test.

news.title: Revealed: Biggest winners of new multi-billion euro transport windfall
news.summary: Limerick, Galway and Donegal will get the largest state investment in roads infrastructure to the end of the decade as part of multi-billion euro funding plan announced by the Government.

news.title: ‘We messed up’ – Barry Andrews on Fianna Fáil’s botched presidential election campaign
news.summary: Barry Andrews has said he has “no regrets” about his decision not to contest the presidential election and urged Fianna Fáil to he “honest” when it presents an internal party review into its failed campaign.

news.title: Hong Kong apartment fire: 44 dead, hundreds missing as police blame ‘grossly negligent’ construction firm
news.summary: A huge fire still burning in a Hong Kong apartment complex that has killed at least 44 people and left nearly 300 missing may have been caused by a "grossly negligent" construction firm using unsafe materials, police said on Thursday.

news.title: Deirdre Reynolds: Conor McGregor ‘saw God’ on a psychedelic trip in Mexico – so much for moving statues in Ballinspittle
news.summary: Conor McGregor has found God (reports that God would prefer to remain missing are unconfirmed). The former UFC champion claimed he got a sneak peek at the Pearly Gates after a 36-hour psychedelic trip in Mexico. Not exactly a moving statue in Ballinspittle, but whatever works.

news.title: Tanya Sweeney: Why do people hate Joanne McNally’s South County Dublin accent so much? It’s complicated
news.summary: Joanne McNally is enjoying a big week after breaking another glass ceiling: she was recently announced as the first Irish female comedian to headline her own show at the 3Arena in December 2026.

news.title: ‘I’m 31 and I’ve never lived alone, it’s just not possible’ – Dublin woman forced to move house twice in four weeks as rent crisis worsens
news.summary: For more than seven years, a Dublin woman has drifted from one rented place to another, but in the last month alone, she has had to move house twice.

news.title: Just Between Us:  Lube, pubes and pleasure – Laura Dowling on the truths we were never told
news.summary: In this episode of Just Between Us, Jennifer Zamparelli is joined by pharmacist and author Laura Dowling for the no-nonsense, myth-busting sex education most of us missed out on.
